Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>「幻の庭」<White>って、どんな ところなんでしょうね？
Entry.EnglishText: What kind of place do you think the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White> is?

Entry.JapaneseText: きっと地上にはない、最高にうまい 果物のなる樹があると思うぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: I think there's gotta be trees with delicious fruits that can't be found on earth.

Entry.JapaneseText: キレイな宝石で飾られた宮殿や黄金でできた建物、 池に泳いでる魚も銀色なのよ、きっと。
Entry.EnglishText: Surely there are palaces adorned with beautiful gems, buildings of gold, and fish of silver swimming in the ponds.

Entry.JapaneseText: あまり変な期待は、 抱かない方がいいと思うがな。
Entry.EnglishText: I think it would be best not to expect anything out of the ordinary.
